column4: hey guys when I run sudo apt-get update, I get this error message at the end "W: GPG error: http://us.archive.ubuntu.com intrepid-proposed Release: The following signatures were invalid: BADSIG 40976EAF437D05B5 Ubuntu Archive Automatic Signing Key <ftpmaster@ubuntu.com>
W: You may want to run apt-get update to correct these problems
you shouldn't be using -proposed repos anyway.
